description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部的一个松散政治派系，与改革派相对，通常主张维护或修复计划经济体制、加强社会控制并反对激进的政治体制改革。
description.en: A loose political faction within the Communist Party of China, opposing the reformist faction, generally advocating for the maintenance or restoration of the planned economy system, strengthening social control, and opposing radical political system reforms.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部的一个松散政治派系，与保守派相对，通常支持市场经济、政治体制改革和更大程度的对外开放。
description.en: A loose political faction within the Communist Party of China, opposing the conservative faction, generally supporting market economy, political system reform, and greater opening up to the outside world.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，被视为1980年代保守派的代表人物。
description.en: One of the major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered a leading figure of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，被视为1980年代保守派的重要成员。
description.en: One of the major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered an important member of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，被视为1980年代保守派的重要成员。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered an important member of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，被视为保守派的代表人物之一。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, considered a representative figure of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的卓越领导人，被视为保守派元老之一。
description.en: An outstanding leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered one of the conservative elders.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的卓越领导人，被视为保守派的重要成员。
description.en: An outstanding leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered an important member of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内的理论家和高级官员，被认为是保守派的主要笔杆子。
description.en: A theorist and senior official within the Communist Party of China, considered a leading ideologue of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内的重要理论家和宣传官员，被认为是保守派的代表人物之一。
description.en: An important theorist and propaganda official within the Communist Party of China, considered a representative figure of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济体系，其中生产和价格由供求关系决定，与改革派的经济主张相关联。
description.en: An economic system in which production and prices are determined by supply and demand, associated with the economic proposals of the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济体系，其中生产、资源分配和消费由中央政府计划决定，与保守派的经济主张相关联。
description.en: An economic system in which production, resource allocation, and consumption are determined by central government planning, associated with the economic proposals of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 指放松政府对社会和经济活动的管制，通常与改革派的政治和经济主张相关。
description.en: Refers to the loosening of government control over social and economic activities, generally associated with the political and economic proposals of the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，中国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1992年初视察中国南方，发表一系列重要讲话，重新推动了陷入停滞的改革开放进程。
description.en: In early 1992, Deng Xiaoping inspected Southern China and delivered a series of important speeches, which re-energized the stalled process of reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，被认为是改革派的重要成员，大力推行市场经济改革。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, considered an important member of the reformist faction who vigorously promoted market economy reforms.

description.zh-cn: 由陈云提出的经济理论，主张“计划经济为主，市场调节为辅”，市场应在国家计划的指导下运行，如同鸟在笼中飞翔。
description.en: An economic theory proposed by Chen Yun, advocating for 'planned economy as the primary, market regulation as supplementary,' where the market should operate under the guidance of state planning, like a bird flying within a cage.

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人，其改革政策被中共保守派认为是导致苏联解体的原因。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union, whose reform policies were considered by CCP conservatives to be the cause of the dissolution of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代早期由保守派发起的一场政治运动，旨在清除被认为是来自西方的资产阶级思想影响。
description.en: A political campaign initiated by conservatives in the early 1980s, aimed at eliminating what was considered bourgeois ideological influence from the West.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代中期由保守派发起的一场政治运动，旨在反对被认为挑战共产党领导和四项基本原则的思潮。
description.en: A political campaign initiated by conservatives in the mid-1980s, aimed at combating ideologies perceived as challenging the leadership of the Communist Party and the Four Cardinal Principles.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，被视为改革派的代表人物。
description.en: Former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered a representative figure of the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的抗议示威活动，以武力清场告终，对中国政局产生深远影响。
description.en: Protest demonstrations that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, in 1989, ending in a military crackdown and having a profound impact on China's political landscape.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，被视为改革派的代表人物。
description.en: Former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, considered a representative figure of the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后由保守派发起的一场运动，旨在抵御西方国家通过非暴力方式改变中国社会主义制度的企图。
description.en: A campaign initiated by conservatives after the Tiananmen Square protests, aimed at resisting attempts by Western countries to change China's socialist system through non-violent means.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老，曾任中共中央政治局常委，被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: An elder of the Communist Party of China and a former member of the Politburo Standing Committee, considered a conservative figure.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三次全国代表大会
en: 13th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，提出了社会主义初级阶段理论和“一个中心、两个基本点”的基本路线。
description.en: A national congress of the CPC that introduced the theory of the primary stage of socialism and the basic line of 'one center, two basic points'.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四次全国代表大会
en: 14th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，正式确立了社会主义市场经济体制的目标，标志着改革开放的深化。
description.en: A national congress of the CPC that officially established the goal of a socialist market economic system, marking a deepening of the reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中国在改革开放后实行的经济体制，旨在将市场经济的优势与社会主义制度相结合。
description.en: The economic system implemented in China after the reform and opening-up, aiming to combine the advantages of a market economy with the socialist system.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国前最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the third generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民在庆祝中国共产党成立80周年大会上的讲话，其中提出允许企业家入党的“三个代表”重要思想，引发了保守派的批评。
description.en: Jiang Zemin's speech at the celebration of the 80th anniversary of the CPC, in which he proposed the important thought of 'Three Represents' allowing entrepreneurs to join the party, drawing criticism from conservatives.

description.zh-cn: 一份由保守派人士创办的中国政论杂志，因刊文批评江泽民“七一讲话”而在2001年被停刊。
description.en: A Chinese political commentary magazine founded by conservatives, which was shut down in 2001 after publishing an article criticizing Jiang Zemin's "July 1" speech.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国前最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the fourth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，被广泛认为是改革派成员。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, widely considered a member of the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 一份支持政治改革的中国历史杂志，曾因刊登关于赵紫阳的文章而受到来自江泽民的压力。
description.en: A Chinese history magazine supportive of political reform, which came under pressure from Jiang Zemin for publishing articles about Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前政治人物，曾任重庆市委书记，被认为是保守派的代表人物之一。
description.en: Former political figure in the People's Republic of China, once the Party Secretary of Chongqing, considered a representative figure of the conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市副市长王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件，是引爆薄熙来事件的导火索。
description.en: The incident where former Chongqing Vice Mayor Wang Lijun entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, which served as the trigger for the Bo Xilai scandal.

description.zh-cn: 围绕原中共中央政治局委员薄熙来的一系列政治事件，导致其下台和被判刑，对中共保守派声誉造成严重损害。
description.en: A series of political events surrounding former Politburo member Bo Xilai, leading to his downfall and imprisonment, which severely damaged the reputation of the CCP's conservative faction.

description.zh-cn: 一个支持保守派和毛泽东思想的中国网站，在薄熙来事件后一度被关闭。
description.en: A Chinese website supporting the conservative faction and Maoist ideology, which was temporarily shut down after the Bo Xilai incident.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，习近平在此次会议后接任中共中央总书记。
description.en: A national congress of the CPC, after which Xi Jinping took over as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心，现任中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the current paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 关于当前意识形态领域情况的通报

zh-cn: 关于当前意识形态领域情况的通报
en: Communiqué on the Current State of the Ideological Sphere

description.zh-cn: 一份中共中央办公厅印发的内部文件，要求抵制普世价值、新闻自由等西方思想，显示了习近平执政初期的保守政治路线。
description.en: An internal document issued by the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, calling for resistance against Western ideas such as universal values and press freedom, indicating Xi Jinping's conservative political line in his early tenure.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
en: 2018 amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 此次修宪取消了国家主席的任期限制，为习近平长期执政铺平了道路。
description.en: This constitutional amendment abolished the term limits for the President of the state, paving the way for Xi Jinping's long-term rule.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央党校教授，因批评习近平和中国共产党而被开除党籍。
description.en: Former professor at the Central Party School of the CPC, who was expelled from the party for criticizing Xi Jinping and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人，因批评习近平而被开除党籍并判刑。
description.en: A Chinese businessman who was expelled from the party and sentenced to prison for criticizing Xi Jinping.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，习近平打破常规连任第三届中共中央总书记。
description.en: A national congress of the CPC where Xi Jinping broke with convention to secure a third term as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 自1980年代起，两派在经济和政治改革路线上长期对立。
description.en: Since the 1980s, the two factions have been in long-term opposition over the lines of economic and political reform.

description.zh-cn: 陈云被认为是1980年代保守派的代表人物。
description.en: Chen Yun is considered a representative figure of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Bo Xilai is considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 保守派主张修复文革破坏前的计划经济体制。
description.en: The conservative faction advocated for restoring the planned economy system that existed before the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 保守派在姓社姓资争论中反对大幅度市场化。
description.en: The conservative faction opposed large-scale marketization during the 'Socialism or Capitalism' debate.

description.zh-cn: 改革派支持市场经济。
description.en: The reformist faction supports a market economy.

description.zh-cn: 改革派支持自由民主与政治体制改革。
description.en: The reformist faction supports liberal democracy and political system reform.

description.zh-cn: 陈云提出“计划经济为主，市场调节为辅”的鸟笼经济理论。
description.en: Chen Yun proposed the 'bird-cage economy' theory, advocating for 'planned economy as primary, market regulation as supplementary'.

description.zh-cn: 保守派在1980年代早期主张“反对精神污染”。
description.en: The conservative faction advocated for the 'Anti-Spiritual Pollution Campaign' in the early 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 保守派在1980年代中期主张“反对资产阶级自由化”。
description.en: The conservative faction advocated for the 'Campaign against Bourgeois Liberalization' in the mid-1980s.

description.zh-cn: 因对胡耀邦在八六学潮中过于软弱不满，保守派促使其下台。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Hu Yaobang's perceived weakness in handling the 1986 student protests, the conservative faction contributed to his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，改革派中共中央总书记赵紫阳被罢免。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, the reformist General Secretary Zhao Ziyang was dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡讲话后，重新确立改革开放大趋势，保守派势力大减。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches, the trend of reform and opening-up was re-established, and the influence of the conservative faction was greatly diminished.

description.zh-cn: 中共十四大确立了社会主义市场经济的改革目标。
description.en: The 14th National Congress of the CPC established the reform goal of a socialist market economy.

description.zh-cn: 中共保守派指戈尔巴乔夫是苏联解体、苏共崩溃的罪魁祸首。
description.en: CCP conservatives blamed Mikhail Gorbachev as the main culprit for the dissolution of the Soviet Union and the collapse of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 保守派杂志《中流》因刊文批评江泽民允许企业家入党的“七一讲话”而被停刊。
description.en: The conservative magazine 'Zhongliu' was shut down for publishing an article criticizing Jiang Zemin's 'July 1' speech that allowed entrepreneurs to join the party.

description.zh-cn: 因《炎黄春秋》多次刊登涉及赵紫阳的文章，江泽民要求对其进行严肃处置。
description.en: Because 'Yanhuang Chunqiu' repeatedly published articles concerning Zhao Ziyang, Jiang Zemin demanded that it be dealt with sternly.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民施压处理《炎黄春秋》时，胡锦涛进行了干预，使其社长得以留任。
description.en: When Jiang Zemin pressured for action against 'Yanhuang Chunqiu', Hu Jintao intervened, allowing its publisher to remain in his position.

description.zh-cn: 改革派总理温家宝对保守派的薄熙来不满，并公开批评文革遗毒，被认为意指薄熙来。
description.en: Reformist Premier Wen Jiabao was dissatisfied with the conservative Bo Xilai and publicly criticized the remnants of the Cultural Revolution, which was widely seen as a reference to Bo.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件直接导致了薄熙来的倒台。
description.en: The Wang Lijun incident directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来事件后，支持他的保守派网站乌有之乡被关闭。
description.en: After the Bo Xilai incident, the conservative website 'Utopia', which supported him, was shut down.

relationships.target: 关于当前意识形态领域情况的通报

description.zh-cn: 这份要求抵制西方思想的内部文件，反映了习近平执政初期的保守政治路线。
description.en: This internal document, calling for resistance against Western ideas, reflected Xi Jinping's conservative political line in his early tenure.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 习近平主导了2018年修宪，取消了国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: Xi Jinping led the 2018 constitutional amendment, which abolished the term limits for the state president.

description.zh-cn: 因批评习近平的“独裁统治”，原中共中央党校教授蔡霞被开除党籍。
description.en: For criticizing Xi Jinping's 'dictatorial rule', former Central Party School professor Cai Xia was expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 因反对习近平的统治，商人任志强被开除党籍并判刑。
description.en: For opposing Xi Jinping's rule, businessman Ren Zhiqiang was expelled from the party and sentenced to prison.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在中共二十大上获得第三个总书记任期，全面巩固了其领导地位。
description.en: Xi Jinping secured a third term as General Secretary at the 20th National Congress of the CPC, fully consolidating his leadership position.
